correctness.rationale: Major factual and unit errors plus many fabricated values. Key issues: (1) Dosing/purge times use unit MilliSEC but numeric values are in seconds (e.g., 0.04 and 5 entered as ms), off by 10^3; GaOx extra 40 s purge after last TMGa dose is omitted. (2) Pressure: article reports Pt = 10–20 Pa per subcycle; extracted sets 10 with unit mmHg (MilliM_HG), which equals ~1333 Pa—wrong unit/value and ignores subcycle differences. (3) numberofCycles: set to 12, but n = 12 is supercycles; for the 3/3/2 design total ALD cycles should be 12*(3+3+2)=96. (4) Film thickness conflict: 7 nm inside thicknessControl vs 9 nm at processParameters; article states ~7 nm for PE(1/1/1) and 7–9 nm depending on sequence. (5) Flow rates: coReactantFlow values (150 sccm) are not reported for O2; 150 sccm refers to N2 purging after O2 plasma, so mapping is incorrect; precursor/purging flows per compound are partly conflated. (6) Material and device properties are largely fabricated/not traceable: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap, roughness, film density, uniformity, conformality, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, and TFT metrics (μFE, VTH, SS, on/off ratio) are not provided in the article (only MIS J–E and C–V data are reported). (7) filmComposition.elementalConcentration contains a meaningless single 1% value; although the atomic ratio 1.0:1.0:1.1 matches XPS for PE(1/1/1), most other composition details are unsupported. Correct items include reactor/system, temperature (150 °C), plasma power (200 W), precursors/co-reactant (TMIn, TMGa, DEZ; O2 plasma), GPC values (0.72/0.61/0.92 Å/cycle), and supercycle sequence/counts (3/3/2; InOx→GaOx→ZnOx). To fix: convert all times to milliseconds, correct pressure to ~0.075–0.15 mmHg (or keep Pa consistently), set total cycles to 96 for PE(1/1/1), resolve film thickness to the article’s value for the chosen sample, remove or leave unspecified any property not reported (optical/electrical/TFT/uniformity/conformality/density/roughness), and correct flow mappings (report only N2 carrier/purge flows and avoid unreported O2 flow).

completeness.rationale: Several core parameters are correct (PEALD for InOx/GaOx/ZnOx, precursors TMIn/TMGa/DEZ, O2 plasma, reactor, 150 °C, 200 W plasma, supercycle sequence and counts 3/3/2, and GPCs 0.72/0.61/0.92 Å/cycle). However, the extraction is incomplete and partially incorrect: (1) Multiple processes are described in the article (PE(1/1/1), PE(1/1/2), PE(2/1/1), PE(1/2/1), and mixed PEALD/TALD T(1/1/1)) but only a single process is extracted. (2) Time units are wrong by 10^3: dosing and purge times are given in seconds in the article (e.g., 0.04 s, 5 s, 4 s/1 s), but are encoded as MilliSEC without conversion (e.g., 0.04 ms instead of 40 ms; 5 s should be 5000 ms). The special 40 s purge after the last TMGa dose is omitted. (3) Pressure is incorrect: article reports total pressure per subcycle in Pa (10/20/20 Pa), but the JSON uses 10 MilliM_HG (~10 Torr) and a single value; values should align with the reported Pa and, if a single value is required, be justified. (4) Flow rates: O2 co-reactant flow is not reported; 150 sccm refers to N2 purge after the O2 plasma step, not O2 flow. The JSON maps 150 sccm to coReactantFlow, which is unsupported by the text. (5) Thickness control: numberofCycles should reflect total ALD cycles; with 12 supercycles of 3/3/2, this is 96 cycles, not 12. (6) Schema compliance: processParameters includes an extra filmThickness field (additionalProperties is false) and it conflicts with thicknessControl.filmThickness (7 vs 9 nm). (7) Material and device properties (refractive index, band gap, resistivity, carrier density, Hall mobility, uniformity, conformality, roughness, density, TFT metrics) are not reported in the article; these values are untraceable and should be removed or sourced. (8) Film composition: the atomic ratio 1.0:1.0:1.1 is traceable (XPS for PE(1/1/1)), but elementalConcentration=1% is meaningless; concentrations/ratios should reflect Table 2 (EDX/XPS) and be associated with the specific sample. To improve completeness: add separate process instances for all reported recipes; correct all time units (convert s to ms), include the 40 s TMGa purge, fix pressure values/units, correct flow-rate mappings, set total cycle count appropriately, remove unsupported material/device properties or back them with article values, and resolve schema violations and duplicated/conflicting film thickness entries.
